metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13304 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A information disclosure vulnerability in the Upstream kernel mnh_sm driver. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-70576999.

notes.Note: sbeattie> affected android specific driver only, mnh/mnh-mipi.c does not affect aquarius E4.5 or E5 kernels either

criterions.comment: linux-euclid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
